name: Breaking Gates (itch)
description:
EARLY ACCESS DEMO: We have a demo of the game on the air if you want to give a check can on Google play! Comment to us here what you think of the game!

An exciting combination of classic platform gameplay with fast combat and frenzied combos of a hack and slash on your mobile!

Breaking Gates is a 2d side-scrolling action RPG exclusively for mobile platforms! In the game we control an adventurer whose mission is to destroy all the dimensional gates, magical crevices that release devastating creatures around the world and is causing enormous chaos for the kingdom. For this you must evolve your character, collecting resources and exploring kingdom regions in search of better equipment and challenges. The maps will be separated by regions and each part will have a master that guards its respective gate, in the combat we can jump, dodge and make combos with special attacks.

-  Be attentive in combat!
-  Many combos!
-  Captivating and colorful 2D graphics!
-  Incredible combination of Action and Adventure RPG!
-  Complete missions in search of medals!
-  Find lots of valuable items and secret paths!
